name: Sujit Kumar Yadav
position: IIT KGP  | Reliance Industries Limited | ONGC

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description:  Extensively studied the subsea system of Krishna Godavari Delta 6, pertaining to it’s challenges and working. Studied the challenges of the flow assurance like gas hydrates, wax precipitation, slugging, sand, corrosion issues. Understood the working of MEG and it’s working to prevent the hydrate, how TEG dehydrates the natural gas. Examined the Waste Water visualized the inspection tests which includes the pH, sulphur content, BOD, COD etc.
experience.description_html:  Extensively studied the subsea system of Krishna Godavari Delta 6, pertaining to it’s challenges and working. Studied the challenges of the flow assurance like gas hydrates, wax precipitation, slugging, sand, corrosion issues. Understood the working of MEG and it’s working to prevent the hydrate, how TEG dehydrates the natural gas. Examined the Waste Water visualized the inspection tests which includes the pH, sulphur content, BOD, COD etc. <!---->

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Extensively studied the whole process of deposition of wax in different pipelines for all of the ONGC Plants. Strategized solutions to the problem of deposition of wax by making appropriate changes in chemical dosings. Visualized wax deposition in pipelines in Gamij Field using molecular diffusion model with the help of MATLAB. Prepared a report on working of plants including recommendations for changes to get better products.
